Light and Fast Face Detector ( LFFD ).from sentence: In this paper , we propose a Light and Fast Face Detector ( LFFD ) for edge devices , considerably balancing both accuracy and running efficiency .

one - stage and multi-scale object detec.from sentence: The proposed method is inspired by the one - stage and multi-scale object detection method SSD which also enlightens some other face detectors .

One of the characteristics.from sentence: One of the characteristics of SSD is that pre-defined anchor boxes are manually designed for each detection branch .
